title: Holy Guacamole Jhin is sick!!!!
body: I've never been so keen to play AD Carry, I wonder how badly I'll suck at this guy

replies.body: U could play him jungle if you really wanted to.
After some thought, I'm gonna spam him mid

Nope he isn't. Don't forget about the teaser
Garen- Top
Vi- Jungle
Zed- Mid
Jhin- Adc
Support- Sona


Deadeye is most likely to be a skinline just like the Vandal,Project,Bloodmoon,Marauder,Arcade,Warring kingdom,Mecha,Headhunter,Pool party,Dragonslayer and Guardian of the sands

He looks like he'll be more of a mid laner ((Or maybe even top lane)).

I guess he could work as an ADC but he's more of a caster-marksman.
You know what? I'm actually going to play him Mid heaps to see how he is there
I haven't even looked at this champ yet... I have no idea what he does...
